messages.message:
Hi! There have been multiple Golden Failures in UAT for the logger-in-udf test. Does anyone know who is responsible for this test and the best way to debug the issue?
``` The following 1 tests failed:
  Test_name: logger-in-udf job_id: d0cca3ba-90d4-4a34-a529-62718f53f3fc.
 Error=Logged info missing: pre-flow-udf 
 See the output results: /home/ib-build/workspace/golden-tests-uat/webserver/api-server-apps/build/golden-test/py/tmp/golden_results_1599858597.0890641.txt
Makefile:190: recipe for target 'run-golden-test' failed
make: *** [run-golden-test] Error 1```
Yes, I can look at it later when I get back
So this is passing now. I’ll keep monitoring
@Kerry it failed again :disappointed:. 5 out of the last 7 Golden's on UAT have failed so something definitely feels wrong
@Nidhi I just checked the deployment channel. in fact all recent failures (since 5:09pm ET) are not because of this test - they all seemed to be something random. am i missing something?
this test is consistently passing the last 5 golden
it seems that golden is very flaky in uat. different sets are tests are failing
Hey! Yeah .. it looks like this test failed a couple of times and after that random tests have been failing. Maybe something else is wrong in the infrastructure.
imo, let’s run the goldens locally and confirm?
